name: param
brief:
Parameters (data constants) indexed over sets

Parameters hold fixed data values used in optimization models.

**param_ Base Class:**
- _name: Parameter name
- _id: Unique identifier
- _indices: Index set this parameter is defined over
- _intype: Internal storage type (double_, integer_, etc.)

**Complex Number Support:**
- _is_conjugate: Complex conjugate flag
- _is_sqrmag: Magnitude squared
- _is_angle: Phase angle
- _real, _imag: Real/imaginary part pointers
- _mag, _ang: Magnitude/angle pointers

**Ipopt Integration:**
- _l_dual, _u_dual: Dual values for bound constraints
- _off: On/off flags per instance

**param<type> Template Class:**
- _val: Vector of values
- _range: Min/max bounds
- Indexed access via operator()

**Usage:**
```cpp
param<> cost("cost");
cost.in(Nodes);                    // Index over Nodes
cost.set_val(node_costs);          // Set values
cost("node1");                     // Access by key
```
